about_the_game:
Law and order must be brought to the chaos of the streets of New York, and the only person who can do it is you!


Face a mountain of donuts and liters of coffee that will sweeten the officer's bitter life for a moment. Patrol designated city districts in search of carelessly parked cars and issue them with fines. Not everyone will agree with you, but remember that you are the herald of justice!

Be vigilant! You can receive an emergency or pursuit call at any time. Decide whether you will finish issuing the fine or go straight to the action.

Don't hesitate to use your gun or taser to spice things up, especially in the case of very recalcitrant citizens who start running away when they see you. Suspicious, right?

Watch your surroundings very carefully!
Running a red light, crossing in a prohibited place, blocking the exit, stealing a toy from the store or a car crash are just a few situations that you can witness.

Make your childhood dream come true and become a lawman in the dangerous districts of New York!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Become a lawman in the dangerous districts of New York and taste the life of a real cop! Patrol designated city districts, issue fines, stop suspects and respond to requests. Become a herald of justice in NY!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
